Articles.Content:
I “OK” sign below my cloaked waist. A gigantic hand “necks” the Break hill.

My double-broken tiles.
Reset button. My hill.

The Reset button is damaged and locked.  

So, you get stuck watching

Spoiler

"My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. My hill. ..."

I take a sledgehammer and smash the reset button into non- functioning pieces. Now there is no hill, no nothing. 

My infinite void.

The sign of the infinity was not defined.  

A negative infinite void.

Changed it to Positive.

An infinite height hill of mine.

A delta-function attack.  

The hill is collapsed into "one".

> 
> 
> 14 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> A delta-function attack.  
> 
> The hill is collapsed into "one".
> 

The sheer lack of logic by most of the populous causes the "one" to regrow itself into a hill. PHysiCZ

Mine Hill.
Hive Mill
I worked hard and farmed Bees to let them expand it into a hill...My Hive Hill...

U AR DE WORST! DAIEEEEeE!

-Sr Pelo, 2019

My hill.

I teleport a 250-pound metal cylinder into the hill. The resulting explosion from the incalculable amount of atomic annihilations blows apart the hill.

My hill remains.

I brought a giant blast furnace using 8 Mil Mi-26 Halos and melted your metal cylinder.

***It's my hill now.***

"Release a ton of ClF3"

My fluorinated hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-11-04T11:16:36Z" title="11/04/2019 11:16  AM" data-short="4 yr">November 4, 2019</time> by Space Nerd**

It's chlorinated also.

The Halogen Hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-11-04T12:32:30Z" title="11/04/2019 12:32  PM" data-short="4 yr">November 4, 2019</time> by kerbiloid**

"Adds sodium metal "

My salt hill.

Adds electricity.

Electrolytic Hill.

> 
> 
> 22 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> Adds electricity.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Electrolytic Hill.
> 

using a massive and overly complex set of 80 kilometer sized mirrors in orbit, I harness the energy output of the sun for 30 seconds and direct it towards your hill.

my hole through the earth.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-11-05T16:47:56Z" title="11/05/2019 04:47  PM" data-short="4 yr">November 5, 2019</time> by Dirkidirk**
  
fresh memes required

Hostile takeover.

My hole through the earth.
Donut Hill.

I plug the hole with a trademarked cork that shoots everything that moves.

My flat turret.

I replace the air inside the turret with hydrofloric acid and turn it into mush.

my slime.

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, burn boi said:
> 
> 
> I replace the air inside the turret with hydrofloric acid and turn it into mush.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> my slime.
> 

the slime falls into the hole

My very deep hole in the ground.
Slimewell Hill

Super <abbr title="1. Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it. 2. Overpowered. A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr> laser from Universe Sandbox 2.

My massive cloud of gas.
